title: Race Official Launches Advanced Training Certification Program
author: Training Department
excerpt: A comprehensive new certification program will elevate the standards of race officiating through advanced training modules and practical assessment.
body: Race Official has launched an advanced certification program designed to elevate the standards of race officiating across all levels of motorsport. The comprehensive training modules cover everything from basic flag procedures to complex incident investigation techniques.

The certification program includes online learning modules, practical workshops, and on-track assessment sessions. Participants will gain expertise in race control procedures, safety protocols, and the latest officiating technologies used in professional motorsport.

"Professional officiating is the foundation of safe, fair competition," said Race Official Training Director Michael Thompson. "This certification program ensures that officials at all levels have access to the same high-quality training used in professional racing series."

The program has been developed in consultation with international officiating bodies and incorporates best practices from major racing series worldwide. Certified officials will be eligible for positions in higher-level competitions and international events.

The first certification courses begin next month, with both in-person and online options available to accommodate officials from across Australia and New Zealand. Continuing education requirements will ensure that certified officials maintain current knowledge and skills.
